plot: Six teens go on a snowboarding trip in the mountains to repair their broken friendships. One morning when one of them is found murdered, the other five all become suspects.
title: Cold Cabin
plot_es: Six teens go on a snowboarding trip in the mountains to repair their broken friendships. One morning when one of them is found murdered, the other five all become suspects.
plot_en: Six teens go on a snowboarding trip in the mountains to repair their broken friendships. One morning when one of them is found murdered, the other five all become suspects.
